correctness.rationale: Multiple major issues with both schema compliance and factual alignment. Schema violations: (1) growthPerCycle.value uses unit NanoM but schema requires ANGSTROM; (2) dosingTime and purgeTime use SEC, while schema requires MilliSEC (values should be in ms); (3) filmDensity unit GM-PER-CUBIC-CM used, schema allows only GM-PER-DeciM3; (4) absorptionCoefficient uses PER-CENTI-M, schema requires UNITLESS. Factual errors/fabrications: (1) aldSystem.aldMethod set to TALD for all processes; pO and WpO involve plasma and should be PEALD, only the H2O-only (W) case is TALD; (2) reactor pressure (20 mmHg) not reported in the article; (3) flowRates (100 sccm) not reported; (4) many material and device properties (refractive index, absorption coefficient, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, uniformity, conformality, roughness, film density by XRR, and all TFT device metrics) are not provided in the article—values are untraceable; (5) safety statement “precursor is not pyrophoric” is not explicitly stated; (6) WpO dosingTime omits the 8 s O2 plasma step (article specifies H2O 15 s followed by O2 plasma 8 s). Correct items include precursor identity, carrier/purge gas (Ar), temperature (200 °C), purge time (15 s), plasma power (100 W for pO/WpO), GPCs (0.13/0.07/0.10 nm/cycle), number of cycles and film thicknesses (200/350/270 cycles → ~28.3/24.6/27.7 nm), and no nucleation delay. To correct: fix ALD method labels; change time units to MilliSEC; change GPC unit to ANGSTROM; remove or leave unknown any unreported pressure/flow/material/device properties; set filmDensity per article (≈5.1–5.2 g/cm3) if included with correct unit; include WpO’s 8 s O2 plasma in dosingTime (schema limitation noted).

completeness.rationale: Covers the three distinct ZnO ALD processes (pO, W, WpO) and includes several correct, traceable parameters (precursor, oxidants, 200 °C growth temperature, Ar purge/carrier, 15 s purge, adopted pulse times, no nucleation delay, GPCs, cycles and film thicknesses). However, multiple schema violations and numerous non-traceable or incorrect values reduce completeness. Key issues: (1) ALD method misclassified: pO and WpO should be PEALD, not TALD. (2) Units violate schema: growthPerCycle must be in ANGSTROM (they used NanoM); dosingTime/purgeTime must use MilliSEC (they used SEC); filmDensity requires GM-PER-DeciM3 (they used GM-PER-CUBIC-CM). (3) Non-traceable/fabricated values: reactor pressure (20 mmmHg), all flow rates, optical properties (n, absorption, UV-Vis band gap), electrical properties (Hall data), uniformity and conformality, roughness (AFM), device properties, and safety/film stability/reproducibility claims are not reported in the article. (4) Film density reported as 5.6 g/cm³ (XRR) conflicts with article’s ~5.1–5.2 g/cm³ from HR-RBS; wrong method. (5) Film composition: ‘XPS’ not used; elemental concentration 50% is invented; only the O/Zn ≈1 by HR-RBS is supported. (6) WpO dosing times incomplete: co-reactant sequence should include both 15 s H2O and 8 s O2 plasma; only one value is given. (7) aldSystem substrate lacks p-type/native oxide detail (optional) and deliveryMethod should note bubbler at 70 °C if included. To improve, correct ALD method labels, fix units to match schema, remove or leave unspecified any parameters not reported (pressure, flow rates, optical/electrical/uniformity/conformality/roughness/device metrics), use HR-RBS for composition with O/Zn ≈1, set film density ≈5.1–5.2 g/cm³ with proper units, and include both co-reactant pulse times for WpO.
